posts.post_title: 1903 Cincinnati cabinet photo of Cozy Dolan by Horner. Sold.
posts.post_content:
1903 Cincinnati cabinet photo of Cozy Dolan by Horner. Sold.

It's a dog with the flaws being evident. Make me an offer. S/h will be $6.00 (tracking without signature).
